onyomiExamples.meaning: working so hard as to ruin one's body, struggling to the point of crushing oneself
honourable defeat, honorable defeat, honourable death, honorable death, death without surrender, trying but being utterly beaten, being completely rejected when professing one's love
crushing (into pieces), smashing, cracking, breaking up
working so hard as to ruin one's body, struggling to the point of crushing oneself
